overview.en: TAK develops decentralized public chain of value based on the application characteristics of the Internet of things industry, supports a variety of industrial applications, provides hardware intelligent chip, SDK and other adaptive schemes, combines cryptography technology, distributed architecture, adopts the main chain of DPOA consensus, and constructs a secure, decentralized and high-concurrency block chain network.
overview.zh: TAK基于物联网行业应用特性开发去中心化价值公有链，并支持多种行业应用，提供硬件智能芯片、SDK等多种适应方案，结合密码学技术，分布式架构，采用DPOA共识的主链，构建安全、去中心化的、支持高并发的区块链网络。
